website_summaries.verdict: An uplifting fruit salad mix of grapefruit, mango, papaya and passion fruit mingles with lilies and vetiver, known for its calming qualities.
pros: A relaunch of the much-loved Prescriptives scent, this has many original users happy at its revival
The light, summery scent is energizing and refreshing
cons: Some detractors thought it was not a close enough version of the original

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware... NOT Calyx
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! This is NOT Calyx. I purchased this to replace a near empty for my wife.... she used it today and immediately said this is NOT Calyx. We compared it to a travel size she still had an sure enough its not even close. Even the color is darker in the bottle. I can only presume someone repackaged a different perfume in an empty Calyx bottle and box. Very disappointed as now I have to return it and purchase a new (hopefully real) bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J Webert

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance if you haven’t tried it
customer_reviews.text: My favorite perfume in the 90’s. Great to find it. A grapefruit type smell. I adore it. I wish I didn’t need to sign for the package because I was at work and had to go to the post office
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Harmon

customer_reviews.title: She'll be happy!
customer_reviews.text: My Wife loves Calyx and I like it on her. Win, win. The service was great as well. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F. Melanson

customer_reviews.title: Fruity Calyx
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing not to like! Great scent, an everyday fragrance fo and myself. Price was excellent. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: june kelly

customer_reviews.title: Always a crisp light citrusy mid booster. Leaves you ...
customer_reviews.text: Always a crisp light citrusy mid booster. Leaves you fresh, not coated with fragrance. A classic for casual or dress up..a go to.
customer_reviews.author: Laurin Crosson

customer_reviews.title: Love this scent
customer_reviews.text: I love this perfume! I've use perfume every day, and this is a unique scent--I've never smelled it on anyone before. I get a lot of compliments on it; it's light and not too sweet. It may not be for everyone, so I wouldn't give it as a gift unless the recipient tried it first.
customer_reviews.author: DJChan

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Got a compliment today after wearing this perfume. Don't know if I still like this perfume. It smells cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Ritetrus

customer_reviews.title: My favorite scent
customer_reviews.text: My favorite summer and spring scent I’m glad I found it. Had trouble finding in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: This perfume did not have the fragrance it was supposed to have. I compared it with the same product at Macy's. Bad purchase, very disappointing, as it was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny Herman de Jong

customer_reviews.title: My favorite scent.
customer_reviews.text: Deliver was fast and the item packaging was in tact. Happy to find this item since it was discontinued some time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Broken nozzle
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the bottle of perfume, the nozzle popped right off and would not go back on. Therefore, I can not use the perfume and basically was money down the drain. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My signature scent
customer_reviews.text: Its MY personal favorite. I will always choose this fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really miss the original Calyx by Prescriptives.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. Not the same product. The smell is a little different and it doesn't last. Sorry to say I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: paula A Mathis

customer_reviews.title: it had no scent
customer_reviews.text: it was great. til the great gust of wind turned it inside out. you cant fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: authentic perfume not a knock off
customer_reviews.text: it smells great It was packed well and arrived fairly quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as I bought at Macy's a year ago :((((
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent, it is fresh, green, citrusy and clean.
customer_reviews.author: M Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: I can still enjoy my favorite fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I've used Calyx for years.....when Prescriptives was bought by Este Lauder, they did not purchase the cologne - thanks to you (and now Clinique), I can still enjoy my favorite fragrance!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeteh

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: My signature cologne for over 30 years at least. People stop and ask what I am wearing! Clean yet naturally lovely. I lasts all day into the evening.
customer_reviews.author: anastasia raptis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Calyx and have worn it for years !
customer_reviews.author: Miss Tiggiewinkle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and great product. I would certainly buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else like it. Calyx is for discerning palates.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite scent. Ever. There is nothing quite like it. There never will be. My husband, who can't smell a fire burning ten inches from his nose, goes into paroxysms of joy when he smells Calyx on me. "That is you and I don't ever want you to wear anything else," he said, when I thought of trying something different. One of many things we agree on. A soft citrussy scent that includes lily, jasmine, mandarin, sandalwood and more. Light but not to be ignored. A winner and my signature scent. Been wearing since the eighties.
customer_reviews.author: peapodgrrl

customer_reviews.title: Clean and tangy sweet
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this for 20+ years and always get compliments on it. Fresh and works perfect on my body chemistry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A slight disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: The spray feature was defective but I'm still using the product. It was a bit disappointing, but I shall hope for the best the next time I order online.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Martinicchio

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance not as hoped
customer_reviews.text: This fragrance did not have the same depth as the last time I wore it. It has been a few years since I wore this scent. My memory of it may be fonder but I do remember being able to smell the fragrance on my skin....not so this time. Not sure if the fragrance is past its freshness date? Shipping and deliver great. Arrived sooner than promised...always a good thing!
customer_reviews.author: Mary J

customer_reviews.title: Ei
customer_reviews.text: Only kind I ever use. Been using over 30 years. Just love the fragrance!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Buckmir

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Came on Time! Would Buy again! This was exactly what i wanted no problems getting it!you should buy it now!
customer_reviews.author: aNDREA lARSON

customer_reviews.title: so fresh
customer_reviews.text: I selfishly bought Calyx for my wife because it smells so fresh and clean and as usual it did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Russ Hill

customer_reviews.title: Love this perfume
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this perfume for over 10 years. I love it. I receive many compliments! It is fresh, clean and brightens my day!
customer_reviews.author: Donna K. P.

customer_reviews.title: Clean and light fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a friend and I love it. Not sweet, not suffocating just the perfect amount of fragrance that is light and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Lau

customer_reviews.title: CALYX Always
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Calyx. I receive so many compliments on this exhilarating scent. It's so fresh, clean, and very unique. I didn't think I would be able to find it, but I did. I look forward to ordering more, in the near future. I'm a very, very happy customer !!!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: The scent was just as I remember. Hadn't seen it in the stores for a few years,so I was happy to see I could get it on line. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: An appreciated present
customer_reviews.text: A sweet friend has complimented me on using this fragrance, which I have enjoyed for a number of years. I feel that it's a good value for the price. I bought this item as a gift for her and she has used and enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: David McGrath

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this fragrance for 20 years. You just can't go wrong with this scent.
customer_reviews.author: MC17

customer_reviews.title: The new formula is as good, if not better than the old.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this scent since the late 80s. When I read that Clinique now owned it, reviews said that the formula had changed and that it no longer had the same exhilarating, green scent. Because of that, I held off buying a new one when the last one was empty. Finally, in a futile search for a replacement, I broke down and ordered the new one. YAAAASSSSS! I'm so glad I did! It is every bit as good as I remember, and maybe better. The original scent seemed like it smelled best in the smaller sizes. The large bottle definitely wasn't as good. In this new formula, the scent is excellent the whole way.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Gidget

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. Not what I ordered. Wanted Calyx Prescriptives.....almost fraudulent in the design of cliniques bottle, naming of the product, etc. Does not smell the same. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: D'Anne Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: This smells nothing like the original Calyx. It was a very unpleasant scent and I immediately tossed it. Dont be fooled by these supposed Prescriptive products. They are poor knockoffs.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Unique and wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved this scent but it's not for everyone. Women either love it or hate it. Prescriptives' Calyx line has recently been relisted after a time off the market. It's wonderful stuff. Now I need to see if my girlfriend agrees. Will give it to her on her birthday. Check back for results.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor.Generosity

customer_reviews.title: This scent is fresh and organic!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this fragrance for over 20 years. I get many compliments on the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kamillertime

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is the real thing! I'm stoked to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this fragrance for years. Then I couldn't find it, so when Amazon had it, I bought it again. Very Happy. Will continue to buy this as long as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite fragrances - always loved the citrus smell
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite fragrances - always loved the citrus smell. So grateful I was able to buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Latimer

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!!! My fave scent and I hate going to the mall so I got it here.
customer_reviews.author: Romance Bytes

customer_reviews.title: Calyx is a classic
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite perfumes. So glad I was able to find this on amazon. Love the under notes and fragrance lasts all day
customer_reviews.author: Allison Austin

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Scent
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this light & fresh scent for decades. I am so glad I can still get it online. It stays with you all day so no need to bathe in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Love Calyx, but is this bottle really new?
customer_reviews.text: I have to rate this as just ok only because it does not smell as fresh and lovely as I remember when you could buy it in the store. I do love Calyx but this bottle has that hint of aging perfume smell, which Calyx tends to get pretty quick, even when kept in a dark place. The color of the liquid looks fine but something is off. I wish this product would come back in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: LindaPNJ

customer_reviews.title: The freshest secnt I've ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: This scent is well worth trying. Not overpowering at all. For those who like scents that are not so strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Schultz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't smell like I thought it would! Too bad I can't return it..
customer_reviews.author: Renee Richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered faster than expected and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: perfect summer scent
customer_reviews.text: This is a clean and feminine fragrance. I always get compliments when I wear it, and I'm glad I can find it on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Really fast shipping, exactly what I wanted New In Box...great seller
customer_reviews.author: Dawn England

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought it as a gift for my sister, she loves this fragrance
customer_reviews.author: Taza956935

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My favorite perfume. Very fresh scent. Not to sweet. Receive many compliments on this perfume. Would buy it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Dileo

customer_reviews.title: Reminisce about past use of Calyx!
customer_reviews.text: I had used Calyx many years ago and enjoyed it's fresh fragance. Once again, I am using it. It arrived on time and I reminisced about other times when I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Iris N. Cartagena

customer_reviews.title: Calyx by Prescriptives
customer_reviews.text: This was shipped very fast, was packaged well, and arrived in perfect condition. Calyx has been my favorite fragrance since it first came out, so I was very happy to see it here on Amazon for such a good price! It's a great summer fragrance, and I'll be wearing it - thanks for another great deal. Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Karenne

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I ran out of Calyx a long time ago and live in a small town where it is not available. It's a pricey product so I waited to find it on Amazon at a better price and finally did. I remember when it first came out and the advertising catch phrase is that it smelled like Green. It is a fresh fragrance I enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Debra S

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Either the quality of this perfume has seriously degraded since my last purchase of Calyx or I was shipped a knock-off. It's unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: old perfume set
customer_reviews.text: PERFUME IS OFF-NOTE DUE TO AGE OR IS A KNOCKOFF DEPARTMENT STORES HAVE STOPPED SELLING THIS PRODUCT.THIS PERFUME SET MUST HAVE BEEN A LEFTOVER.
customer_reviews.author: N. Solanko

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this Fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: I use this fragrance every day and evening. It's so versatile and lasts. I've used it for many years and I still get compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina T.

customer_reviews.title: AHHH...An old fav!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this perfume...I was heart broken when Macy's stopped carrying it...and on a whim...typed in Calyx on one of my many Amazon trips...and voila...there it was...and I jumped on it. So glad I did...I love this scent and it's perfect for Spring/Summer (nice and light)...thank you Amazon...will be getting the shower gel and lotion. Good buy...Great price!!
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGeek

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Not too fruity, I fell in love with this scent a decade ago, love it! Fresh with a hint of ginger.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Purcell
